job.name: CollectInquiriesJob
job.description: This Job collects inquiries from all brokers this instance of share-client is registered to, stores them in the database and spawns ExecuteInquiriesJobs

job.name: ExecuteInquiriesJob
job.description: This Job collects inquiries from all brokers this instance of share-client is registered to, stores them in the database and spawns ExecuteInquiriesJobs

job.name: UploadToCentralMdsDbJobDktkFlag
job.description: This Job prepares and/or performs an upload to the central mds database, depending on the status. It performs an incremental upload of those patients that gave their explicit consent to be included in the DKTK.

job.name: UploadToCentralMdsDbJobNoDktkFlag
job.description: This Job prepares and/or performs an upload to the central mds database, depending on the status. It performs an upload of those patients, that have not explicitly given their consent to be included in DKTK, but can be uploaded due to another given consent.

job.name: CheckLocalComponentsJob
job.description: This job checks the other local components (id manager, local datamanagement) for their version and status

job.name: DbCleanupJob
job.description: Do some housekeeping in the database (e.g. mark inquiries as archived after a certain amount of time)

job.name: ReportToMonitoringJob
job.description: This job performs tests to determine values for an amount of patient data available or how long it takes to execute an inquiry

job.name: ReportToMonitoringJob24H
job.description: This job performs every 24 hours tests to determine values for an amount of patient data available or how long it takes to execute an inquiry

job.name: SendNotificationsJob
job.description: This job checks if there are inquiry results with a result size greater than zero about which no user has been notified yet. It sends e-mails to the configured users (given that a mail relay is configured) and marks that a notification has been sent

job.name: DirectorySyncJob
job.description: Synchronize the information about the biobank in the store with the data in the directory.

job.name: CheckScheduledInquiriesJob
job.description: Check if an inquiry is executing too long

job.name: ExecuteInquiryJobSamplystoreBiobanks
job.description: This Job posts an inquiry to the local datamanagement, stores the location and spawns a CheckInquiryStatusJob

job.name: ExecuteInquiryJobCql
job.description: This Job posts an inquiry to the local datamanagement, stores the location and spawns a CheckInquiryStatusJob

job.name: ExecuteInquiryJobCentraxx
job.description: This Job posts an inquiry to the local datamanagement, stores the location and spawns a CheckInquiryStatusJob

job.name: CheckInquiryStatusJobSamplystoreBiobanks
job.description: This Job checks the status of the given inquiry and spawns new jobs if necessary

job.name: CheckInquiryStatusJobCql
job.description: This Job checks the status of the given inquiry and spawns new jobs if necessary

job.name: CheckInquiryStatusJobCentraxx
job.description: This Job checks the status of the given inquiry and spawns new jobs if necessary

job.name: CheckInquiryStatusReadyForMultipleCriteriaCql
job.description: This Job checks the status of all associated inquiry criteria and spawns new jobs if necessary

job.name: GenerateInquiryResultStatsJob
job.description: This Job generates statistics (by gender and by age) for an inquiry result
